mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
Combat/trap rooms where
the player takes damage
are marked with red

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
Tasks that unlock paths 
or create progress conditions
are marked with green

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
- A very useful practice is to setup modules and
color code them so the diagram is easier to
understand and to keep track of all modules better;

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
- The access to the next level can be unlocked after
completing a series of tasks that take place in
different areas of the level or just by having a certain
requirement (like having enough black resources);

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
- Challenges and rewards can be added throughout
the level as well as losing conditions.
